General.Name: Stardust Power Inc.
General.Description: Stardust Power Inc. develops battery grade lithium products in the United States. The company is developing a lithium refinery in Muskogee, Oklahoma for producing battery-grade lithium carbonate. Stardust Power Inc. was founded in 2022 and is headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut.
General.Address: 15 E. Putnam Ave, Greenwich, CT, United States, 06830
